Developer Terms of Use
des:
KITCHEN AND GRILLING TRICKS AND TIPS FROM THROWDOWN KITCHEN
What is the right time and temperature for a brisket? How do you know when chicken is done? What is the secret to great-tasting chops? Is it possible to smoke a turkey and not have it dry? The all stars at Throwdown Kitchen have assembled a collection of tried and true kitchen and grilling tricks and tips. You’ll learn the difference between Choice and Prime, how to make a quick barbecue sauce as well as an easy trick for making your own chili powder.
